title: How to Learn Next Js asdsd
content: Next.js is touted as the next big thing in the web development world and 2022 may be a good time to learn Next.js. In this article, I have shared online courses from Udemy, Educative, and Pluralsight that will teach you Next.js with React.js, even if you have no background on React as well as some advanced courses for developers who are already familiar with React and just want to learn Next.js.
